overview:
General Manager - IT & Technology Evangelist

Over 18 years technology expertise, partnering with leading private and public enterprise to deliver solutions which enhance content delivery, online sales, communications, security and mobile data management. Hands on and management experience in data-centric, enterprise online / Saas and mobile technology industry consulting, design, solutions implementation, management. End-to-end SDLC management for both hardware and software.

Solutions Architecture, Integration Specialist, R&D and Product Development

Skilled in the architecture, integration and software development behind enterprise Saas and mobile technology solutions including; Hosted applications, load-balancing, datacentre design, network and application security, enterprise content management (ECM), eCommerce (B2B / B2C), mobile field force automation, mobile / GSM communications, spatial / tracking, networking, systems design and specialist software and embedded hardware.

Project delivery

Projects have been wide and varied with delivery across multiple internal and external customer groups, demonstrating abilities to manage multiple / competing customer priorities and engagements. Exposure to leading project management systems, ERP solutions and PM methodologies. Recent external key clients include; Defence, Telstra, Wilson Security, Panasonic, NSW Police and many more.

Effective business team leader and manager.

Recognised as a business leader who enjoys inspiring others to greater performance, and building confidence through mentoring, coaching and training. Able to influence others to achieve a common goal and skilled in managing, at code-review level, a multi-disciplined staff to achieve desired performance goals and objectives. —————————————————————————————————

â€œMy passion for delivering results and my ability to effectively communicate a technology vision for overcoming complex technology challenges has enforced my reputation as a driven, high-end achiever and a versatile and innovative solutions provider. With a clear history of achievement, and demonstrated ability to architect complex data-centric, online and mobile solutions, I am able to offer both innovation and determination with the flexibility to meet the challenges faced across a broad range of markets.â€
